DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study IRB-approved umbrella protocol number 811698 name Penn-CMU Roybal Center Behavioral Economics Health . Interventions increase consumption fruit vegetable date show promise , many limited public health impact due lack scalability design . Many intervention provide information constitutes healthier eat provided discount specific products.Other intervention limited generalizability due utilization specific eat establishment vend machines.By contrast , investigator propose examine effectiveness feasibility intervention promote increase consumption fruit vegetable incentivizing purchase overwhelm majority food sell : grocery store . Collaborating Brown 's Super Stores UpLift Solutions leadership , investigator enroll shopper Randomized Clinical Trial use web-based research infrastructure call Way Health platform . The primary aim project generate preliminary evidence efficacy two financial incentive structure promote allocation great percentage one grocery budget purchase fresh fruit vegetable ( hereafter , produce ) . Secondary aim evaluate intervention effect ( 1 ) self-reported consumption produce , ( 2 ) weight . Salutary goal pilot study document feasibility use Price Plus card incentive study , expand functionality Way Health platform .
